explanation:
code_hardening: Added null checks for mRecyclerView and mListener before use, verified the touched view with an instanceof check before casting to CardLayout, and ensured the derived Card is non-null before invoking the callback.
resolve_compilation_errors: Removed the RecyclerView parameter from the constructor and relied on the existing mRecyclerView field; updated position retrieval to mRecyclerView.getChildPosition(childView); updated the listener invocation to onItemLongClick(Card, int); referenced CardLayout and Card via fully qualified names within the function.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: Changed long-press handling to cast the touched child to CardLayout and derive the payload via getCard(), then dispatch onItemLongClick(card, position); preserved single-tap behavior by returning true in onSingleTapUp.
refactoring: Renamed local variables for clarity (childView, cardLayout, card) and centralized RecyclerView access through the mRecyclerView field instead of a constructor parameter.
misc: Updated inline comments to reflect preserved single-tap behavior; no additional custom APIs beyond existing project types were introduced.
